## Regression statistics

| Statistic | Value |
| --- | --- |
| R-squared | `r round(params$stats$r_squared, 4)` |
| Adjusted R-squared| `r round(params$stats$adj_r_squared, 4)` |
| F-statistic | `r round(params$stats$f_statistic, 4)` |
| P-value (regression) | `r format.pval(params$stats$p_value, digits = 4)` |
| Correlation coefficient | `r round(params$stats$correlation, 4)` |
| P-value (correlation) | `r format.pval(params$stats$cor_p_value, digits = 4)` |
